name: Immunisation Vaccine Type
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="immunisation_vaccine_type"
	label="Vaccine"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_immunisation_vaccine_type"
	sql_title_column="name"
	sql_title_key="guid"
	urlSelect="index.php?option=com_###component###&view=immunisation_vaccine_types&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=immunisation_vaccine_type.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=immunisation_vaccine_type.edit&guid={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	titleSelect="Select a Vaccine"
	titleNew="New Vaccine"
	titleEdit="Edit Vaccine"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="true"
	edit="true"
	clear="true"
	class="input-large"
	description="The immunisation vaccine"
	hint="Select a Vaccine"
/>
